ONE·one ONE · One full-text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://wufazhuce.com 哪些歌充满了秋天的氛围感？http://m.wufazhuce.com/question/3918
;23 Sep. 2023 
;
;
;
; Autumn Equinox Elf Question
;
;

; Which songs are full of autumn atmosphere?

;
;
;
;
; Answer from ONE Editorial Department
;
;

;

;;
;

;;——"Late Autumn";

;

;
;

;

;
;

;

;;1;

;

;The time when I was confused and lonely

;

;I have become accustomed to tolerance

;

;Why am I happy at this moment? Heart

;

;But I can’t help but want to cry

;

;;;Xu Wei’s "Autumn Sea"

; span>;;

;

;;Words: Xu Wei;

;

; 

;

;;2;

;

;And the season of the fall begins

;

;;Autumn has arrived;

;

;Past the passingbell, past willow weeping

;

;;Go Over the knell, through the weeping willow;

;

;A ripple forms on the brinks of time

;

;;A ripple appears on the edge of time;

;

;But the night becomes you

;

;; The night becomes you;

;

;And the secrets of the rain, they will stay the same

;

;;And the secret in the rain, they have not changed;

;

;;;Lake of Tears< /span>;;;;;《Forever Autumn》;;;

;

;;Words: Daniel Srebrenaric;

;

; 

;

;;3 ;

;

;The sea doesn’t understand

;

;Those who make the tide

;

;After summer, it will never come back

;

;Like a beach Footprints

;

;The attachment is still clear

;

;Waiting for time to bury it

;

;;;Su Huilun "Autumn Sea";;

;

;;Words: Yao Qian;

;

; 

;

;;4;

;

;Dreams are moments

;

;;Dreams are fleeting;

;

;night is long

;

;;The night is too long;

;

;Yet, we linger

;

;;We Still lingering;

;

;in the past

;

;;in the past;< /p>;

;Tell me, do you

;

;;Tell me if you;;

;feel the same

;

;;Empathy;

;

;; ;JIDA/;;;;Rachel Lim《Autumn Breeze》;;

;

;;Words: JIDA;

;< p>; 

;

;;5;

;

;Walked through the cold wind again

;

;The last light went out

;

;I am slowly traveling through memories

;

;In this lonely season

;

;It is still a lonely season

;

;The same lonely season

;

; ;;Tao Zhe "The Lonely Season";;

;

;;Words: doll;

;

; 

;

;;6;

;

;I  really thought I was OK

;

;;I really thought I was OK;

;< p>;I really thought I was just fine

;

;;I really thought it was no big deal;

;

;But when I woke this time

;

;;But this time when I woke up< /span>;

;

;There was nothing to take me back to sleep

;

;;I toss and turn, unable to fall asleep;

;

;To take you off my mind

;

;;I want to get you out of my mind;

;

;;;Rachael Yamagata《; ;;;Over And Over》;;

;

;;Words: Rachael Yamagata;

;

; 

;

;;7;

;

;You are like a white dot in the light

;

;I am the black line stuck on it

;

;But you can only be silent

;

;The mist in the early morning brushes against the door Front turn to the other side of the house

;

;Indifferently indifferently

;

;;;Zhang Yadong "Fog";;

;

;;Words: Zhang Qianqian;

;

;  

;

;;8;

;

;I see it all through a telescope

;

;;I want to peek into the future;

;

;Guitar' suitcase' and a warm coat

;

;;There is a guitar, a suitcase and your warm coat;

;

;Lying in the back of  the blue boat

;

;;We lay on the boat and swam in the blue waves;

;

;Humming a tune

;

;;Sing gently to this song I wrote for you;

;

;;;The Weepies《;;;;Gotta Have You》;;

;

;;Words: ;The Weepies;;

;

; 

;

;;9;

;

;I still remember the door number of the hotel that day

;

;I still have the look of leaving with a smile

;

;The whole city was so brisk that day

;

;Walk along the half-mile long street together

;

;;;Faye Wong's "Promise";;;

;;Words: Lin Xi;

;

; 

;

;;10 ;

;

;Time won't fly, it's like I'm paralyzed by it

;

;< span style="color: rgb(128, 128, 128);">;Time stands still like I'm numb;

;

;I'd like to be my old self again

;

;;I want to be my old self;

;

;But I' ;m still trying to find it

;

;;But still looking for it;

;

;After plaid shirt days and nights 

;

;when you made me your own

;

;;After those days and nights in plaid shirts, I still belong to you;

;

;Now you mail back my things 

;

;and I walk  home alone

;

;;Now you have sent my things back and I am walking home alone;;

;;;Taylor Swift《;;;;All Too Well》;;

;

;;Words: Taylor Swift/ Liz Rose;

;

; 

;

;;11;

;

;The slowly falling maple leaves are like longing

;

;I lit candles to warm the autumn at the end of the year

;

;Aurora plundered the horizon

;

;The north wind passed by and missed your face

;

;I burned my love into fallen leaves< /p>;

;But I can’t change the familiar face

;

;;;Jay Chou's "Maple";;

;

;;Words: Song Jianzhang;

;

; 

;

;;12;

;

;The falling leaves

;

;;Falling fallen leaves;

;

;drift by my window

;

;;piled up by the window< /span>;

;

;The autumn leaves

;

;;The fallen leaves in autumn;< /p>;

;of red and gold

;

;;showing golden and fiery red;

;

;I see your lips

;

;;I see your lips;

;

;The summer kisses

;

;;Thinking of those passionate summer kisses;

;

;The sunburned hands

;

;;And your hands burned by the scorching sun;

;

;I used to hold

;

;;I have been close to my arms;

;

; ;;Eric Clapton《;;;;Autumn Leaves》;;

;

;;Words: Eric Clapton;

;

; 

;

;;13;

;

;You sit on the chair looking at the light flowing through the window

;

;You Stretch out your hands and touch the hope written on the paper

;

;You said that the flowers bloomed and fell like a window

;

;But the window opened and fell again Close Like love

;

;You are holding a flower waiting for someone to take you wandering

;

;You want to sleep in the distance Like a beautiful fairy tale

;

;The book closed and opened, and the dream fell down

;

;The two of us closed and separated like a pair of oars

;

;;;Junzi "The Beginning of Autumn";;

;

;;Words: Gao Xiaosong;

;

; 

;

;;14;

;

;I couldn′t make the  colors match today

;

;;Can't match today's colors;

;

;I don&prime ;t know what else to say

;

;;I don’t know how to say it;

;

;Except I tried and they can′t say I didn′t

;

;;I Try your best, others are understandable;

;

;I don′t like the stuff they′re feeding me

;

;;I am tired of the ideas they instill in me;

;

;They don′t like the things I see

;

;;They don’t like my ideas either;

;

;But I don′t think I need  ;to be forgiven

;

;;But I don’t expect to be forgiven;

;

;;;Andy Tubman《;;;;Quiet Inside》;;

;

; 

;

;;15;

;

;Autumn mood Inadvertently  Freehand writing very comfortable

;

;Singing style Poetry feeling Drunk feeling Drunk in love

;

;Heart feeling Impossible Thinking How true love is

;

; p>;

;Infinite affection It’s harder than a careless kiss

;

;;;"Cozy" by Hacken Lee; ;

;

;;Words: Zhou Limao;

;

; 

;< p>;;16;

;

;I've had enough

;

;;I've had enough;

;

;Of this parade

;

;;This series< /span>;

;

;I'm thinking of

;

;;I am thinking;

;

;The words to say

;

;;What to say;;

;We open up

;

;;We open our hearts;

;

;Unfinished  ;parts

;

;;Unfinished parts;

;

;Broken up

;< p>;;Falling apart;

;

;It's so mellow

;

;;And so mellow;

;

;;;Travis《;;;;Closer》;;

;

;< span style="color: rgb(89, 156, 215);">;Words: Fran Healy;

;

; 

;

;;17;< /p>;

;Love is enough to make two people unforgettable

;

;Loneliness but I am the only one to bear it

;

;Thank you for walking by my side

;

;You are like a stranger The familiar sunshine

;

;reminds me that I am wandering on the earth

;

;It turns out that I will still see you panic

;

;;;Tang Wei "Late Autumn";;

;

;;Words: Lin Xi;

;

; 

;

;;18;

;

;Reflections in the water

;

; ;Reflection in water;

;

;Memory is all I see

;

;;I see countless memories;

;

;Everything's out of order

;

; ;Everything gets confusing;

;

;Wanna build back the pieces

;

;< span style="color: rgb(128, 128, 128);">;Want to put the pieces back together;

;

;Who am I supposed to be;

;

; p>;

;;Who should I be;

;

;Before time goes shorter

;< p>;;Before time becomes short;

;

;;;Lin Yilian ";;;;breathe in... breathe out";;

;

;;Words: Kelvin Avon/Curtis Richardson/Gong Shuoliang/Lin Yilian;

;

; 

;

;;19;

;

;Some people run too fast

;

;And some people run half a beat slower< /p>;

;Become the guy named "myself"

;

;Some regrets are a kind of perfection

;

;Some blessings I say to myself

;

;Wish you Live the most beautiful way

;

;The way that belongs to you

;

;;;Zhou Xun's "Look"< /span>;;

;

;;Words: Wu Qingfeng;

; Sat, 23 Sep 2023 06:25:03 +0800 可以成为我的秋天吗（诗六首）http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/6098
;23 Sep. 2023 
;
;
;

;Text/Jiao Yelu

;
;

;

;< img data-author="" data-original-src="http://image.wufazhuce.com/FkRGlVBg-Ts-S7pP-Nl9x0A3ro5-" data-source="" src="http://image.wufazhuce. com/FkRGlVBg-Ts-S7pP-Nl9x0A3ro5-">;
;
;
; 
;

;This is the most It’s a good season, the air is crisp and clear in autumn, but it can’t help but make people feel heavy. Reading these 6 little poems will make the lonely days feel better.

;
;

;
;

;

;;Can you be my autumn;

;

; 

;

; Can you be my autumn

;

;When my dusk

;

;begins to lose

;

;You are just like me;The lonely hand;

;

;stopped the world

;

;all the swaying wind

;

; 

;

; The wheels of the year are coming

;

;The sleepless golden leaves are lined up by our windows

;

;in a queue of life and death

;

;And;Our old age is huddled together safely;

;

;The door is open

;

;But we have no visitors today

;

;  

;

;When you nod gently

;

;My attachment to this life

;

;becomes deeper

;

;And time slows down in the room Get up slowly

;

;Before leaving, it ; did not say goodbye;

;

; ;

;Just patted us

;

;;Golden dust;

;

; 

;

; 

;

;;The osmanthus are all very good;

;

; 

;

;You have not forgotten me

;

; Just outside my hometown

;

;In a different language

;

;Those;Osmanthus;Just like you

;

;Trivial, once we meet

;

;Just tell me the rustling ones

;

;;Old words;

;

; 

;

;went downstairs last night, I hold the ;Autumn Crab; sent by my parents

;

;, and stop at With your golden color

;

;In silence, waiting for your usual greetings

;

;Cross the fence and Nanshan, falling on ;my shoulders;

;

; < /p>;

;This city knows nothing about you

;

;That’s why you dare to cut autumn like this Short

;

;Always wait for you to finish speaking

;

;Winter is coming

; p>;

; 

;

;So I put ;Carry that letter with you;

;

;I can’t see your eyes, but I have already

;

;Smell your ;soul; when you approach quietly

;

;I will send myself to you in the wind

;

; 

;

;Tell you

;

;;Osmanthus; are all very good

;

;Growing up alone, I become more and more like you

;

;No longer forget the small past events

;

;Like you, I have been away from home for a long time

;

;I am walking alone, ;Autumn in a foreign land;.

;

; 

;

; 

;

;;Share happiness;

;

; 

;

; A person

;

;Walks on the way home

;

;passes many ;strangers' houses;

;

;The autumn air is crisp, they

;

;are drying at the door

;

;Full grains of happiness

;

; 

;

;Ah, they With so many, I don’t even

;

;worry about someone stealing ;one;

;

;  ;

;

;The days when I approached them

;

;Smell the ;moistness of the old days;< /p>;

;They recognize those ;spotted;

;

;but ripe rice grains

;

; I have seen a bigger autumn

;

;I have already learned to chew slowly

;

; 

;

;See those bowls;Stones;

;

;Never make any noise, just pick them out

;

;and place them on the head of the table;

;

; p>;

;After packing it up, it’s time to look again

;

;The sun has gone down and the whole world is empty

;

;There is only one ;Dusk;

;

; 

;

; 

;

;;Enron Leave, my summer;

;

; 

;

;Leave, summer , my summer

;

;No need to give anything to autumn

;

;I no longer need to

;

;Borrow the sun from you again;;

;

; 

;

;I am about to start harvesting

;

;Peace of mind Harvest from the ground

;

;Rot is the last fruit from high places

;

;And I have just set foot on it

;

;;My ladder;

;

; 

;

;Don't help me, even if I fall

;

;I will fall, I will fall

;

;But not for fear of your soul

;

;;Call me down; and make my body

;

;right I know nothing about pain

;

;You said that skipping questions

;

;will turn white Things turn red

;

;Please let me face the sky

;

;Let me run the fastest Front

;

;Spotted by an arrow

;

;You have completed your mission

;

;——;If life really has a mission;

;

; 

;

;Leave, summer, my summer

;

;You have used your love to deepen my trust in the world

;

;The distant uneasiness is now;Ripening;

;

;They will one day fall from the tree of my childhood

;< p style="text-align: right;">;Just like you, become the soil of memory

;

;Only send out some when it rains;Rusty sound;

;

; 

;

;Leave, summer, my summer

;

;Everything you want to say and not say

;

;Every rice ear knows that at dinner time

;

;They will put;Jerky words;

;

;Peel them apart one by one

;

;You want Everything that is said but not said

;

;They will be brought to you one by one.

;

; 

;

; 

;

;;Dear little ant;

;

; 

;< p>;Dear little ant

;

;Those ;anxious days;

;

;are all over&mdash ;—

;

; 

;

;If you can’t move Mount Tai

;

;Let them become feathers

;

;It’s easy to get lost after the rain

; p>;

;In that ;leaf field;, you sit on the ground

;

;or lie down and use the leaves that are close to you Cover your eyes

;

;Everything withered and yellow seems to be gently waking you up

;

;Your ;youthful dream;, but you are not going to wake up yet

;

;Wake up and follow the lineage of your ancestors

;

;Enter the forest

;

; 

;

;Dear The little ant

;

;The sunshine you like will become sparse from now on

;

;——

;

; 

;

;The world is After you ;out of the crowd;

;

; gradually become;Stingy;

;

;Thank you for your ;rainy; heart

;< p>;Can adapt to such occasional ;thinness;

;

;You can always rely on your own tentacles

;< p>;Find those with good weather

;

;Just like you would notice this when the street lights

;

;turn on one by one

;

;

;

; There are also;cities;

;

;where there is no smoke );">;Moments like home;

;

; 

;

; 

;

;; The calendar finally turned to this page;

;

; 

;

;The calendar finally turned Go to this page

;

;September, October, then November

;

; 

;

;People will cry bitterly by the water during this season

;

; ="text-align: right;">;Drink a glass of tears together and say goodbye

;

;We don’t want this

;

;Keep it simple, dear

;

;Love and death

;

;Neither have to deal with it Too verbose

;

;Better like a poem

;

;Or a lonely wild goose in a poem

;

; p>;

;;Start; with ;End;are just

;

;;white A line of;

;

; 

;

;The same as starting over a period of time;

;

;

;As simple as a reed breathing

;

;We have a lot of time before we grow old

;

;Used to be young, used to throw those stones into the void

;

; align: right;">; 

;

;I hope you will also start to adapt to life on land

;

; I hope you are like me

;

;What time will ;reveal; , just swim towards whatever ;;

;

;and hold on tightly

;

;Peace is the only straw for the dying

;

;That one;Skinny camels;, I will bring them out of the desert

;

;When you hear behind you< /p>;

;Don’t look back when the bell rings——

;

; 

;< p style="text-align: right;">;If you still feel sad

;

;You can turn the calendar forward thousands of years

;

;Thousands of ancient people are strangers to us

;

;But they are already here at this time

;

;Will;Our Today;

;

;Sadness

;

;;Thousands of times; .

;

;
;

;Editor: Nana

;The author's first collection of poems "I Wake Up Three Times a Day" has been published.

;Me I no longer want to hear what people say, I want to hear what the pine trees and the wind say.
